channel.title: All Client Issue
channel.description:
Alright, so hey, I'm new to Moparscape.org and I am having some trouble with my clients. I am pretty sure my run.bat is all correct and everything. Every client lately I've been trying to run keeps getting the same error. Here is what is generally in the run.bat contents. [code]@echo off title Client cd ./Class/ "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_31\bin\java.exe" -Xmx500m Gui 30 0 lowmem members 32 pause[/code]
And here is what I keep getting as an error. [code]The system cannot find the path specified. Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: Gui Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: Gui at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(URLClassLoader.java:202) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(URLClassLoader.java:190) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:306) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Launcher.java:301) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:247) Could not find the main class: Gui. Program will exit. Press any key to continue...[/code]
Yes I just wrote that all out instead of doing a picture lol. Now here's the picture. [img]http://gyazo.com/001b67f748d95ff785fbd5d1af57a42d[/img] (not too sure if the picture will show, did a preview and it's not showing, sorry) I'd greatly appreciate it, trying to host this for some friends of mine. Maybe if I learn enough about coding I'll release a source and client here later :) (Only after I learn a TON)
Thanks for all your help everyone! Love, Ashely ;D

item.title: All Client Issue
item.dc:creator: @Ashely Ashely
item.description:
@Ashely wrote:

The jdk is the right one because I already changed it to mine. The Gui class is right in there, I don’t know what’s wrong.

Read full topic

item.title: All Client Issue
item.dc:creator: @xI_c_E xI c E
item.description:
@xI_c_E wrote:

The system cannot find the path specified. Change the jdk1.6.0_31 to your java version.

Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: Gui That means it cannot find the Gui class.

Read full topic

item.title: All Client Issue
item.dc:creator: @Ashely Ashely
item.description:
@Ashely wrote:

Alright, so hey, I’m new to Moparscape.org and I am having some trouble with my clients. I am pretty sure my run.bat is all correct and everything. Every client lately I’ve been trying to run keeps getting the same error. Here is what is generally in the run.bat contents.

@echo off title Client cd ./Class/ "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_31\bin\java.exe" -Xmx500m Gui 30 0 lowmem members 32 pause

And here is what I keep getting as an error.

The system cannot find the path specified. Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: Gui Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: Gui at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(URLClassLoader.java:202) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(URLClassLoader.java:190) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:306) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Launcher.java:301) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:247) Could not find the main class: Gui. Program will exit. Press any key to continue...

Yes I just wrote that all out instead of doing a picture lol. Now here’s the picture.

(not too sure if the picture will show, did a preview and it’s not showing, sorry)
I’d greatly appreciate it, trying to host this for some friends of mine. Maybe if I learn enough about coding I’ll release a source and client here later (Only after I learn a TON)

Thanks for all your help everyone!
Love, Ashely ;D
